body_html:
Yes; gather/gather_nd fetch zeros for invalid indices because it's hard / expensive to send an error message back to the CPU.

Regarding gather/scatter, I did not modify those to add int32/int64. only gather_nd/scatter_nd [those functors are in separate files].
body_text:
Yes; gather/gather_nd fetch zeros for invalid indices because it's hard / expensive to send an error message back to the CPU.
Regarding gather/scatter, I did not modify those to add int32/int64.  only gather_nd/scatter_nd [those functors are in separate files].
body:
Yes; gather/gather_nd fetch zeros for invalid indices because it's hard / expensive to send an error message back to the CPU.

Regarding gather/scatter, I did not modify those to add int32/int64.  only gather_nd/scatter_nd [those functors are in separate files].
